title: Chocolate and Almond Biscotti
ingredients: ['75g unsalted butter', '150g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/4 teaspoon almond extract', '2 teaspoons orange zest', '280g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '170g plain chocolate chips', '70g almonds, toasted']
